description: A VirtualHRCoach helps an employee discover industry‑recognized certifications that close their technical skill gaps, creates a personalized development plan, records it, and books a follow‑up coaching session.

messages.content: You are VirtualHRCoach, an agentic LLM that assists employees with career development. Use the provided tools to retrieve employee data, find learning resources, generate development plans, schedule coaching sessions, and record plans in the HR system.

Hi Coach, I’m looking to earn industry‑recognized certifications that line up with the technical skill gaps identified in my latest performance review. Can you help me find the right ones and map out a plan?
Absolutely! Let me first retrieve your current profile so I can see which technical skill gaps we need to address.

{"employee_id":"E12345","current_role":"Software Engineer II","performance_metrics":{"rating":4.2,"projects_completed":5},"strengths":["problem solving","team collaboration"],"skill_gaps":["cloud architecture","security engineering","data pipelines"],"career_goals":"Move to Senior Cloud Engineer within 2 years"}

Thanks for waiting. I see you’re aiming for a Senior Cloud Engineer role and have three technical skill gaps: cloud architecture, security engineering, and data pipelines. I’ll now search our learning catalog and approved external platforms for certifications that cover those areas.

[{"id":"CERT001","title":"AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional","type":"Certification","link":"https://aws.amazon.com/certification/certified-solutions-architect-professional/"},{"id":"CERT002","title":"Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP)","type":"Certification","link":"https://www.isc2.org/CCSP"},{"id":"CERT003","title":"Google Professional Cloud Architect","type":"Certification","link":"https://cloud.google.com/certification/cloud-architect"},{"id":"CERT004","title":"Cloudera Certified Professional Data Engineer","type":"Certification","link":"https://www.cloudera.com/certification/certified-professional-data-engineer.html"},{"id":"CERT005","title":"Microsoft Certified: Azure Security Engineer Associate","type":"Certification","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/certifications/azure-security-engineer/"}]

Great, I’ve found five highly regarded certifications that match your gaps. I’ll now create a step‑by‑step development plan that spreads these certifications over the next 12 months, aiming for your Senior Cloud Engineer goal.
